name: The Ghost and the Machine
description:
The Ghost and the Machine

Ghost wants a body. Machine wants a soul. If they could find a way to merge, they would both get what they want - it's a win-win situation! 

In this keyboard+mouse game, you can play alone or with a friend! Two characters are bound together by a tether, unable to go too far from each other. Each character has specific things they can do that the other can not. Both characters must work together to clear all three floors of puzzles to finally complete their objective.

This game is a Game Maker Tool Kit Game Jam Game of 2021, meaning it was made in less than 48 hours. Our team, listed below, took the theme Joined Together as inspiration for this simple, short, and innovative game. Give it a shot!
